titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of that much lamented and no less wanted, industrious labourer in Gods vineyard, the Reverend Mr. Ralph Venning, vvho quitted this vale of tears, and put on immortality the 10th day of this instant March, 1673/4.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Hark! how our sion with heart-piercing groans ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
